jobDescription: FLEX by Fenwick has an immediate opportunity at a hot content company for a strong licensing attorney with content and media experience. The ideal candidate with have expertise in: Contract Drafting & Negotiation for Entertainment Content – Music, Film, Television, VideogameProduction, Licensing, & Distribution Agreements for Online and Traditional MediaBusiness Models & Deal StructuresCopyright Law; Media LawRights Dispute ResolutionWebsite Documents and Compliance – EULA, Terms of Use, Copyright Policy, Privacy Policy, DMCA compliance
